CustomField.description: This will show you how many days from Web Open Holds Cleared Actual to Today excluding weekends
CustomField.formula: (5 * ( FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Web_Open_Holds_Cleared_Actual__c- DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Web_Open_Holds_Cleared_Actual__c- DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.label: Number of Days in Onboarding
